answers.answer: Aw! Well if you've always been confident don't let this stop you! The Miracle of life is such a beautiful thing and you should feel proud and beautiful!  Some men just don't know how to handle the change of pregnancy and others are actually scared they'll hurt the baby! Talk to him openly about your concerns :) I am also overweight.  I'm 4 weeks 3 days and I think I ALREADY look pregnant to the outside world. And everyone thinks I'm further along haha moral of the story is to love yourself and roll with the punches as they come :) I don't have any advice on the clothing unfortunately.  I wear alot of dresses anyway so I'm going to stick with regular clothing as long as possible :) best of luck mama!
Thank you!! I've tried talking to him about it but he takes it personal and offensive
